title: Topic 001 Question 138
body: You have downloaded and installed the gcloud command line interface (CLI) and have authenticated with your Google Account. Most of your Compute Engine instances in your project run in the europe-west1-d zone. You want to avoid having to specify this zone with each CLI command when managing these instances.
options: Set the europe-west1-d zone as the default zone using the gcloud config subcommand.
